```{r}
litterNum_label <- c(
  "1" = "first litter",
  "2" = "second litter"
)

facetForLitterNum <- facet_grid(
    cols = vars(litterNum),
    labeller = labeller(
      litterNum = litterNum_label
    )
  )

figureNum <- 1

pptBaseName <- function(figNum) {
  baseName = paste0("MNC_fig", figNum, "_")
  return(baseName)
}

subFolder <- "MNC"

imgType <- "pdf"
```

# Dam Behavior
```{r}
dam_behavior_filtered <- dam_behavior %>%
  filter(
    Litter_size_startPara >= 5
    , time != 9
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    firstDay = ifelse(
      damID == "D015", 
      FALSE, 
      ifelse(
        (cohort == 2 | cohort == 4 | cohort == 6), 
        TRUE, 
        ifelse(
          damID == "D051-01",
          TRUE,
          FALSE
        )
      )
    )
  )
```

```{r}
behaviorOverTime <- dam_behavior_filtered %>%
  behavior_overTime(
    yVar = Num_exits,
    yLab = "# of exits",
    fontSize = 28,
    dotSize = 5,
    dotSize_byFirstDay = FALSE,
    timeBreaks = c(14, 16, 19, 0, 4),
    timeLabels = c("ZT14", "ZT16", "ZT19", "ZT0", "ZT4"),
    lineSize = 0.75
  )
plot <- behaviorOverTime +
  facet_wrap(
    ~litterNum + earlyLifeTrt,
    ncol = 4,
    labeller = labeller(
      litterNum = litterNum_label
    )
  )+
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom"
    # , axis.title.x = element_blank()
  ) +
  guides(
    fill = "none"
    , linetype = "none"
  )+
  labs(
    shape = "start on P5"
    ,x = "ZT hour"
  ) +
  scale_x_discrete(
    labels = c(
      "ZT14" = "14\nlights off"
      , "ZT16" = "16"
      , "ZT19" = "19"
      , "ZT0" = "0\nlights on"
      , "ZT4" = "4"
    )
  ) +
  # labs(x = "ZT hour") +
  expand_limits(y = 70)

plot

fileBaseName <- "damBehavior"
thisWidth = 17.5
thisHeight = 6.5
thisUnits = "in"

flexSave(
  baseName = fileBaseName,
  thisFilePrefix = pptBaseName(figureNum),
  plot = plot,
  fileType = imgType,
  filePath = file.path(plotOutputFolder, subFolder),
  width = thisWidth,
  height = thisHeight,
  units = thisUnits,
  compType = currentCompType,
)
```

## ANOVA
```{r}

damBehaviorAnova <- dam_behavior_filtered %>%
  anova_test(
    dv = Num_exits,
    wid = damID,
    between = c(earlyLifeTrt, litterNum),
    within = time
  ) 

damBehaviorAnova$ANOVA%>%
  myDisplay()

dam_behavior_filtered %>%
  group_by(
    time
  ) %>%
  anova_test(
    dv = Num_exits,
    between = c(earlyLifeTrt)
  ) %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni")
```

## Body Mass ANOVA
Group by dam and sex
Look at start of paradigm, end of paradigm, weaning, day 35, and day 70
```{r}
massLong <- Mass_off %>%
  filter(
    Litter_size >= 5
    , cohort == 2 | cohort == 4 | cohort == 6 | cohort == 7 | cohort == 8
  )  %>%
  getAvgByDam(bySex = TRUE) %>%
  makeOffMassLong()

massLong_filtered <- massLong %>%
  filter(
    day == 4 | day == 11 | day == 21 | day == 35 | day == 70
  )

massANOVA_byDam <- massLong_filtered %>%
  anova_test(
    dv = mass,
    wid = damID,
    between = c(earlyLifeTrt, litterNum),
    within = c(sex, day)
  )

massANOVA_byDam$ANOVA %>%
  formatAnova()

bySexAnova <- massLong_filtered %>%
  group_by(
    sex
  ) %>%
  anova_test(
    dv = mass,
    wid = damID,
    between = c(earlyLifeTrt),
    within = day
  ) %>%
  get_anova_table() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni") %>%
  formatAdjAnova()

bySexAnova

bySexAnova %>%
  get_anova_table()
  # %>%
  # formatAnova() 
```

# Maturation
The paradigm was run with dams' first or second litters

```{r}
filteredDF <- Maturation_off %>%
  filter(
    damStrain == "CBA",
    cohort == 2 | cohort == 4 | cohort == 6 | cohort == 7 | cohort == 8,
    Litter_size >= 5
  )
Maturation_byDam_5plusPups_females <- filteredDF %>%
  filter(
    sex == "F"
  ) %>%
  getAvgByDam()
Maturation_byDam_5plusPups_males <- filteredDF %>%
  filter(
    sex == "M"
  ) %>%
  getAvgByDam()

df_females <- Maturation_byDam_5plusPups_females
df_males <- Maturation_byDam_5plusPups_males
```

### Linear mixed effects model
```{r}
library("lmerTest")
library("lme4")
```

```{r}

VO_age_mod <- lmer(
  VO_age ~ earlyLifeTrt + Litter_size + litterNum + (1 | damID),
  data = filteredDF %>% mutate(Litter_size = as.integer(Litter_size)),
  subset = !is.na(VO_age)
)
summary(VO_age_mod)
anova(VO_age_mod)
```

```{r}
Estrus_age_mod <- lmer(
  Estrus_age ~ earlyLifeTrt + Litter_size + litterNum + (1 | damID),
  data = filteredDF %>% mutate(Litter_size = as.integer(Litter_size)),
  subset = !is.na(Estrus_age)
)
summary(Estrus_age_mod)
```

```{r}
PreputialSep_age_mod <- lmer(
  PreputialSep_age ~ earlyLifeTrt + Litter_size + litterNum + (1 | damID),
  data = filteredDF %>% mutate(Litter_size = as.integer(Litter_size)),
  subset = !is.na(PreputialSep_age)
)
summary(PreputialSep_age_mod)
```

# ALPS response
## Second litters
```{r}
Cort_off_filtered <- Cort_off %>%
  filter(
    litterNum == 2,
    Litter_size >= 5,
    !is.na(cort),
    !exclude
  )
thisSex <- "F"

cortByCycle <- Cort_off_filtered %>%
  filter(
    sex == thisSex,
    (Sac_cycle == "proestrus" & ReproTract_mass >= 125) | (Sac_cycle == "diestrus" & ReproTract_mass <= 100),
    mouseID != 653
  )

cortByCycle %>%
  cortAnova(
    byCycle = TRUE
  )

cortByCycle %>%
  group_by(
    Sac_cycle
  ) %>%
  anova_test(
    dv = cort,
    wid = mouseID,
    between = c(earlyLifeTrt, adultTrt),
    within = time
  ) %>%
  # adjust_pvalue() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni") %>%
  formatAdjAnova()

cortByCycle %>%
  group_by(
    Sac_cycle, time
  ) %>%
  anova_test(
    dv = cort,
    wid = mouseID,
    between = c(adultTrt)
  ) %>%
  # adjust_pvalue() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni") %>%
  formatAdjAnova()

cortByCycle %>%
  pairwise_t_test(
    cort ~ Sac_cycle,
    p.adjust.method = "bonferroni"
  )
```

```{r}
LH_filtered <- LH_off %>%
  filter(
    Litter_size >= 5,
    litterNum == 2,
    Sac_cycle == "proestrus" & ReproTract_mass >= 125
  )

tempLHPlot <- function(
  df,
  ymax = 40
){
  df %>%
    LHPlot(
    fontSize = 28,
    dotSize = 5,
    zoom_y = TRUE,
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = ymax
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~comboTrt)
}

thisWidth = 7.4
thisHeight = 6.5
```

```{r}

thisGroupLH <- LH_filtered %>%
  filter(
    earlyLifeTrt == "STD",
    adultTrt == "CON"
  )

plot <- thisGroupLH %>%
  tempLHPlot()

plot

fileBaseName = "LH_STD-CON"

flexSave(
  baseName = fileBaseName,
  thisFilePrefix = pptBaseName(figureNum),
  plot = plot,
  fileType = imgType,
  filePath = file.path(plotOutputFolder, subFolder),
  width = thisWidth,
  height = thisHeight,
  units = thisUnits,
  compType = currentCompType,
  shinySettings = FALSE
)
plot <- thisGroupLH %>%
  tempLHPlot(ymax = 10)

plot
```

# Cycles distribution
```{r}
cycles_1stLitter_contTable <- table(
  cyclesLong_1stLitter$earlyLifeTrt,
  cyclesLong_1stLitter$stageName
)

cycles_1stLitter_ChiSq <- chisq_test(cycles_1stLitter_contTable)
cycles_1stLitter_ChiSq %>% flextable()

chisq_descriptives(cycles_1stLitter_ChiSq) %>% flextable()
```

### Representative
```{r}

  fontSize = 28,

  ncol = 2,

  fontSize = 28,
  removeFacets = TRUE,
  ncol = 2,
  nrow = 3
  )+ theme(
```

```{r}
    litterNum == 2,
    Sac_cycle == "proestrus" & ReproTract_mass >= 125
  )

tempLHPlot <- function(
  df,
  ymax = 40
){
  df %>%
    LHPlot(
    fontSize = 28,
    dotSize = 3,
    zoom_y = TRUE,
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = ymax
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~comboTrt)
}

thisHeight = 2.75
```
